bpmnProcessId.description: the BPMN process id tied to the subscription

correlationKey.description: the correlation key of the message. It is only set when a message is correlated to this subscription. Otherwise, it returns an empty string.

messageKey.description: the key of the message. It is only set when a message is correlated to this subscription. Otherwise, it returns -1.

processDefinitionKey.description: the process key tied to the subscription

processInstanceKey.description: the key of the process instance that was created by this message. It is only set when a message is correlated to this subscription. Otherwise, it returns -1.

startEventId.description: the id of the start event tied to the subscription

variables.description: the variables of this record. Can be empty.
